EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Make-A-Wish Volunteer Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!npe5__Affiliation__c.npe5__Contact__c},
Congratulations, you have completed your volunteer on-boarding and have been granted access to the active volunteer community! We are excited to welcome you as a Make-A-Wish® volunteer. To get started, please visit the Make-A-Wish Volunteer Center with the username below.
Username: {!npe5__Affiliation__c.User_Name_Hidden__c}
From there, you can stay informed about everything happening at our chapter. You’ll find:
New volunteer opportunities Information about the wish-granting process Helpful tips Ways to get even more involved in helping kids with life-threatening medical conditions
You will also be able to review and update your volunteer profile.
As always, please feel free to contact the chapter with any questions, comments, concerns or ideas.
Thanks,
{!npe5__Affiliation__c.npe5__Organization__c}
